title: My game is breaking HELP
body:
Recently leage has been messing up for me and it's not letting me play, what happens is that i start any game it works fine but then a little bit into it i hear crackling and popping sounds, i tab out and it goes away but comes back as the same when i tab back in. i'd be fine with the sound alone but the weird thing is that it does the same thing for someone on the other end of a skype call and disappears for them when i tab out. the sound isn't the main issue though, the problem id really like fixed is the fact that my game will just completely freeze and i have to forcibly shut down my computer and restart it to get it back. tabbing out doesn't work nor do alt+f4 or any of those. i've tried reinstalling,checking for updates in league and my computer, using leagues repair thingy but none of them have helped with the problem at all. the amount of time i get in game before it freezes changes each time. earliest ive seen was at minions spawning latest was around 10 min in. if i forcibly shut my computer and relog back into league and join the game. it works fine but then as i said before the audio bug happens again and freezes a bit later. the audio problems seem to be from league as it only happens when im in game but still happens when i fully mute league.
sorry for the rambling its just im really confused as to why it would suddenly break and i'd like to get it fixed

replies.body: It sounds like your drivers or hardware could be having trouble and causing the game to render improperly, causing these freezes.  As a first step, I recommend going through the instructions in our [game crash ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)guide.  This will help tune up your PC and configure your settings to get you back in the game.  Hope that helps!
